summary: AN ORDINANCE increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1994 budget of the Human Rights Department to provide for the implementation and operation of a data tracking system to collect information about the City's activity under the WMBE Ordinance, by reappropriation and transfer from the "WMBE Reporting System" in the Department of Finance General, by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
